about_the_game:
Joyville 2 is a first-person horror puzzle-adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. Explore two parallel worlds where the joy of the past meets present horrors. Uncover the camp's dark secrets, face magical yet dangerous creatures, and discover the truth behind events from decades ago.

Key Features

  • Dual World Exploration: Dive into two contrasting worlds — one filled with childhood wonder and magic, the other with dark reality, where joy has turned into fear. Relive childhood memories and face what they’ve turned into.

  • A Gripping Story Full of Dark Secrets: Return to the camp where tragedy struck decades ago. Your goal is to find your missing sister and uncover the dark secrets of the abandoned camp.

  • Dangerous Creatures and Deadly Games: The friendly characters from the magical world have turned against you. These creatures are no longer your friends — they are your enemies, turning games into deadly traps. Surviving will take wit.

  • Solve Puzzles and Uncover the Truth: Along the way, you'll encounter unique puzzles that test your logic and attentiveness. Every corner of the camp holds clues and secrets that will help you piece together the mysteries of the past.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Joyville 2 combines horror with hints of tenderness, crafting a world where dread and childhood innocence exist side by side.

A Chilling Story

Long ago, Joyville was a place where dreams came true. Its founder, a brilliant inventor named Harrison Vanderbilt, created amazing toys that could transport children to a magical world—one full of joy, fun, and endless adventures. Everything changed after a sudden tragedy. The camp was closed, Harrison was imprisoned, and your sister mysteriously disappeared.

Now, years later, you return to the camp to uncover the truth. But the camp is no longer what it once was. You’ll relive moments from your childhood, but this time, the games come with new, terrifying rules.

Key Story Highlights

  • The Mysterious Closure of the Camp: What caused the sudden closure of the camp? What dark events led to Harrison’s downfall? Uncover the truth as you dive into the story's past.

  • The Disappearance of Your Sister: As you delve deeper into the past, you begin to recall the final day in the camp and realize your sister may have fallen victim to something far more sinister than a mere accident.

  • The Fall of Harrison Vanderbilt: Learn the truth about the man who created the magical world of Joyville, who went from hero to outcast in an instant.

Additional Details and Side Features

  • World to Explore: Every corner of the camp holds mysteries and memories, waiting to be uncovered by the most attentive and daring players.

  • Atmospheric Music and Sound Design: The sounds around you will alter your sense of reality, immersing you deeper into the story and increasing the tension with every step.

  • A Journey Through the Past: A magical rabbit helps you revisit your childhood, but beneath the joyful surface hides a dark truth.

  • The Fine Line Between Play and Survival: Can you outsmart the deadly games and escape with your life? In Joyville 2, the games are no longer just fun—they are life or death.
